title: Multi monitor resolution issue
body:
i use a multimonitor setup. my main screen is a vertical screen but i play games on horizontal ones.
when i load up league the only resolutions are vertical. i cant change them to horizontal resolutions. any ideas?

replies.body: You're probably going to need to change the main monitor to be one of the horizontal ones in order for League to display horizontally by default. If that isn't possible for any reason, go ahead and hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if they have any other tricks for that!
